item.title: Installation of MongoDB via a Kubernetes Operator - Community MeetUp - March 10th
item.description: Join us in The Percona Community MeetUp and walk with us through the installation of MongoDB via a Kubernetes operator. Sergey Pronin will take us through all steps of the setup to get us started with a new MongoDB Cluster. Stop by and ask your questions and receive an answer right away. Join us in Community MeetUp for MongoDB Day: Thursday, Mar 10th, 11 am EST (5:00 pm CEST / 9:30 pm IST) Live stream on YouTube and Twitch Live chat on Discord Add this event to your Google Calendar We Will Talk About: Installation of MongoDB via a Kubernetes operator, with Sergey Pronin and Matt Yonkovit
